name: Row Editing - DevExtreme Tree List
description: This example demonstrates editing in «row» mode. Each row is supplied with an «Edit» link, a click on which switches the row into the editing state. Editors vary from one cell to another: they may be calendars, select boxes, simple text boxes, etc. Note that you can also add or delete a row using the «Add a row» button or the «Delete» link, respectively.
